title: PowerShadow
description:
PowerShadow is more than instant restoration software. It is a revolutionary preventive approach to computer integrity protection. You can use PowerShadow to virtualize your whole hard drive or C drive only into a disposable session. Computer equipped with this virtualized hard drive is just the same as your original one WITHOUT performance loss. You can do anything you like on this computer, but everything you do is completely isolated from the original hard disk. End this session with a reboot and all modifications on virtualized hard drive will be gone. Your hard disk will return to the very intact status.

This is the free Chinese 2.8 version. Follow the instructions to make into English.

2.6 version sells here http://powershadowsecurity.com/default.aspx for $39.
